[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Configuration/ConfigurationContract_Helper.cs] [Function: AssertPerformedByConfigurationControllerOrZeroContract()] [SetConfiguration Integration] Used only by SetConfiguration - if configuration values control other contract behaviors, can Zero contract bypass create privilege escalation chains?
